divs: Sighting DetailsI'm at home outside in my backyard Just looking at the night sky Noticed these bright balls of fire like stars but color was orange to yellow then red noticed visible movement There are three sometimes more keeping various positions consistently over 10 days now they all seem to move sucessively have yet to see them take off more than the edges of the constellations nearby this is wild They appear closer than any other stars and yet seem to be attempting to blend in by holding these positions I know you get stuff every day but Ive been out there everynight and they haven't disappeared yet Its more than my eyes adjusting to the dark these balls of fire move way outside a mere wobble I'm amazed and rather anxious to know if these are documented and if not they should be
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: For 10 days 3+ ufo's keep same positions over night sky near stars clearly visible movement
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wanaque
There were no other sightings in Wanaque on or around March 7th 2006
